page.title: 20The School Day (Cont)
page.content: During mid morning break we play football on the field I have my friends with me and with our 'Mitre' ball have a good game, we all play fair even though there is no refree to see if there is fair play. After break we change groups, lunch is at twelve thirty which usually consists of chips, vegetables and pie and with a pudding of some sort. By one fifteen we start school again until three when the teacher reads us a story, this term we have 'Empty World' by John Christopher which is a story of a boy left all alone in a world where everyone has died of the plague. At three thirty we go home.
